description: The United States and Canada endured the planet’s biggest air pollution surge in 2023 — an upswing driven by the northern neighbor’s worst wildfire season on record, a new report has found. Canada alone experienced its highest levels of fine particulate pollution (PM 2.5) in at least 26 years, with more than half of residents...
title: US, Canada had highest air pollution surge worldwide in 2023: Report

Over the weekend, the D.C. National Guard shared a video of troops hauling garbage bags and...
